General.Name: Glomac Bhd
General.Description: Glomac Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development business in Malaysia. It operates in three segments: Property Development, Construction, and Property Investment. The company develops residential, commercial, and mixed development properties, as well as townships; invests in and sells land and buildings; and provides property management services. It also constructs buildings; operates and manages car parks and restaurants; and provides building contracting services. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
